snippet: The Obama administration issued a final permit for Shell to start drilling for oil and gas in the Chukchi Sea off Alaska’s northwest coast.
abstract: Interior Dept gives final permit to Shell to begin drilling for oil and gas in Arctic Ocean off Alaska.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration issued a final permit for Shell to start drilling for oil and gas in the Chukchi Sea off Alaska’s northwest coast.

headline.main: Shell Wins Final Permission for Arctic Oil and Gas Drilling
headline.print_headline: Shell Wins Final Permission for Arctic Oil and Gas Drilling
